column5: I just got done searching extensively to find out information on excellent adventures out of read lake. I was unable to find anything recent. I checked their website and it appears to be a pretty good place at a reasonable price. Just wondering if anyone has any recent experience from this year or last year with them. I am trying to get a trip together for the summer of 2019. It is between them and Chimo. I was considering Viking out posts but I see they were recently sold and it seems like it may be a bit confusing as to what's going on Thank you for any information
If it’s run by a couple of guys named Bill and Ted then I'm sold, they can take all of my money.
My apologies. Chimo sold. Not Viking
Chimo has sold???? Can anyone confirm this???? And if so, to who???
they sold to superior airways. it is on their website and facebook
Shame if so. Hope superior is good outfit
Faron and Joyce have been treating me right since 1997, fished Sumach, Cat Island and Headwaters! Landed a 46.5 today and am on cloud 9! Already rebooked for 2019.
It I see on chimos web site. When you get to tier site check there Facebook link
5thsuit, please pm me when you have time. Would love to get more info. And I hope you took a pic of that fish
